${ModID}:Alclawmize.NAME: Alclawmize
${ModID}:Alclawmize.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a random unique *Claw-themed potion. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ClawForOne.NAME: Claw For One
${ModID}:ClawForOne.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put all *Claw cards from your discard pile into your hand.

${ModID}:Conclawd.NAME: Conclawd
${ModID}:Conclawd.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Sharpen !M!. NL End your turn.

${ModID}:InfiniteClaws.NAME: Infinite Claws
${ModID}:InfiniteClaws.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain a *Ghost *Claw.
${ModID}:InfiniteClaws.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, gain a *Ghost *Claw.

${ModID}:MutateClaw.NAME: Mutate Claw
${ModID}:MutateClaw.DESCRIPTION: Choose an Attack in hand to ${ModID}:Modify: 'Name gains Claw' and 'Gain a *Ghost *Claw'. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:MutateClaw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an Attack in hand to ${ModID}:Modify: 'Name gains Claw' and 'Gain a *Ghost *Claw'.

${ModID}:SearingClaw.NAME: Searing Claw
${ModID}:SearingClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Sharpen !M!. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

${ModID}:TalkToTheClaw.NAME: Talk to the Claw
${ModID}:TalkToTheClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you attack this enemy with a *Claw, gain !M! Block. NL Exhaust.
